# Prerequisites

- python 3.6 or above
- visual studio code, jupyter-lab or jupyter notebook

- [pygame.org](https://www.pygame.org/news)
- [ThePythonGameBook](http://thepythongamebook.com/en:pygame:start)

- Physics Simulation
    - [pygame physics simulation by http://www.petercollingridge.co.uk/tutorials/pygame-physics-simulation/](http://www.petercollingridge.co.uk/tutorials/pygame-physics-simulation/)
    - [Intro to 2D game physics with pygame by pet.timetocode.org](https://pet.timetocode.org/)
